securityLevels.title: Security levels & controls
securityLevels.description: Risk-based tiers align technical controls with the potential harm of disclosure or alteration.

public.name: Public
controls: Content integrity checked via hash digests

medium.name: Medium
controls: Continuous anomaly detection on access patterns

high.name: High
controls: Quarterly access reviews with dual approval

restricted.name: Restricted
controls: Dedicated vault network segments with break-glass procedures
Immutable audit logging retained for 24 months

encryption.title: Encryption strategy

rest.title: At rest
items: AES-256-GCM applied via managed KMS with tenant scoped keys
Secrets segregated in a hardware security module with quarterly rotation

transit.title: In transit
items: TLS 1.3 enforced with modern cipher suites and HSTS
Mutual TLS between internal services with short-lived certificates

encryption.dynamic: Streaming payloads are chunk-encrypted and signed to guarantee integrity for real-time dashboards.

policies.title: Policies, Agreements & Lifecycle
policies.subtitle: Transparent commitments that govern how your data is handled.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Our privacy policy documents what we collect, why we collect it, and how you can exercise your rights.
items: Collection is limited to operational telemetry, account metadata, and voluntarily submitted content.
Data is retained only while you maintain an active relationship or as long as regulations require.
We never sell personal data. Third-party processors are contractually bound to equivalent safeguards.

userAgreement.title: User agreement
userAgreement.intro: The user agreement defines acceptable use and the responsibilities we both share.
items: You agree to provide accurate information and refrain from uploading sensitive personal data.
We commit to service availability targets and to notifying you of material changes at least 30 days in advance.
Dispute resolution prioritises amicable settlement before escalating to arbitration in your jurisdiction.

deletion.title: Data deletion workflow
deletion.intro: When you request erasure, we orchestrate a verifiable multi-step workflow.
steps: Identity verification through signed challenge or authenticated session.
Soft delete within 24 hours while downstream caches and search indexes purge references.
Cryptographic erasure of encrypted blobs by destroying keys, followed by confirmation report.
